mapper.update:
update tb_extract
account_id = #{accountId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
alipay_count = #{alipayCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
alipay_name = #{alipayName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
current_remain = #{currentRemain,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where extract_id = #{extractId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update tb_extract set account_id = #{accountId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, alipay_count = #{alipayCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, alipay_name = #{alipayName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, current_remain = #{currentRemain,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where extract_id = #{extractId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
